m_szDocSumamry: Will Mercedes-Benz Be The Father Of Luxury Hydrogen Fuel-Cell Cars? by Gabriel Eum Share on Facebook Share on Twitter It may be onto something with this new crossover. Automakers have recently been trying out different green ways to power cars. Tesla has been at the top of the electric car game for some time. Toyota also has its funky-looking Mirai, powered by a hydrogen fuel-cell, that debuted last year .
